Privacy Policy

Simple and Transparent

At Corewood AI, we believe in keeping things simple and transparent when it comes to your privacy.

No Cookies

We do not use cookies on our website. Your browsing experience is not tracked or monitored through cookies.

No Data Collection

We do not collect or persist any personal data from visitors to our website. Your information stays with you.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about our privacy practices or would like to discuss your GRC and AI needs, please reach out to us directly.

We're here to meet with you and discuss how we can help with your governance, risk, and compliance requirements.
